      • initialize

      • configure

        public void configure(GUI gui,
                      LeaderBoard leaderBoard,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> usernameStrings,
                      java.util.List<Character> characters)
        Method that needs to be called after the controller is instantiated. Sets the labels using the leaderBoard message.
        Parameters:
        gui - Reference to the GUI
        leaderBoard - leaderBoard message
        usernameStrings - List of usernames from the configurationMessage
        characters - List of Characters from the configurationMessage

      • createUsernamesMap

        public java.util.Map<Character,java.lang.String> createUsernamesMap(java.util.List<java.lang.String> usernames,
                                                                    java.util.List<Character> characters)
        Initializes a Map with the Characters and the usernames
        Parameters:
        usernames - List of usernames (Strings)
        characters - List of Characters
        Returns:
        Returns a map with the Character as a key and his username as the value

      • handleExitGameButton

        public void handleExitGameButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Handles the Exit Game button. It closes the program.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - actionEvent caught

      • handleNewGameButton

        public void handleNewGameButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
        Handles the New Game button. Closes all the windows of the program and displays again the login window.
        Parameters:
        actionEvent - actionEvent caught
